dict.string:
Disables volume down buttons (on both the device & wired headset).
*Useful if you have broken volume buttons which trigger inadvertently.
⚠️ NOTE: All "volume down" adjustments must me made via control center or "Settings -> Sounds" when using this patch. I suggest making a volume menu via Activator (with frequently used volume levels i.e. 50%, 75% etc. maybe triggered by a shake or connected to headset etc).
[v.1] Tested with an iP6+ 9.0.2 & 9.3.3. Made as a request via r/jailbreak. (10-9-16)
☞PayPal: goin730@gmail.com
